Interfaces

This identifies a class as an object shifter. More...

This identifies a class as an object shifter.

This identifies a helper class as a utility provider.

Object shifters are typical static function providers (helpers) that shift the first argument off the parameter stack and use it as the target object of the method called.

Obviously, the sender must unshift itself onto the stack. The YiiXL class provides methods to do this.

See also:
YiiXL
